## PagesAnalyticsService.setConversionTrackingEnabled() method

Turns on conversion tracking. Will allow page views and other events to receive credit for conversion events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setConversionTrackingEnabled(enabled: boolean, cookieId: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enabled | boolean |  |
|  cookieId | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
